ComicInfo.Title: Attack on Technodrome, Part 3
ComicInfo.Summary:
A major battle on Burnow Island unfolds! Will the Turtles be able to help Fugitoid to deactivate the Technodrome before itâ€™s too late? Meanwhile, Splinter and the Mutanimals go up against Karai and the Foot!
